title: Complete the GRANT Statement
description: Fill in the blanks to grant SELECT permission on a schema to a group, and USE CATALOG permission to access the parent catalog.
hints: GRANT is followed by the privilege name
ON specifies the object type and name
optimalSolution:
GRANT USE CATALOG ON CATALOG main TO `data-analysts`;
GRANT SELECT ON SCHEMA main.sales TO `data-analysts`;
explanation: Unity Catalog permissions are inherited but explicit grants are needed at each level. USE CATALOG is required to access any objects within a catalog. SELECT on a schema grants read access to all current and future tables in that schema.
